content.raw:
What is the official URL that we will be replacing it with? I see the following when I browse to the s3 bucket:

http://shrub.appspot.com/osrf-distributions/

Should we make a subdomain of osrfoundation.org that we use for our official links?

There's still references to gazebosim.org/assets/distributions in [homebrew formulae](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation) and probably other places as well.
content.html:
